short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visit the clicker counter and become a pro in mouse-clicking, build your record, and challenge your friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A clicker counter is a tool where you can enhance your clicking speed and check your click per second; you can also build your record with the help of a clicker counter tool.

Use our chrome web store to visit the clicker counter tool. If you are a gamer, this tool is suitable for enhancing your clicking speed because many games need to click speed.

Also, in this clicker counter tool, we have a tool for you to become a pro in spacebar hitting; that tool is the spacebar counter tool. The spacebar counter is easy to use, and anyone can access to use.
